data.text: “Trɔ ŋkɔ na nɔviwò ŋutsua be Ami, si gɔmee nye ‘Azɔ ènye tɔnye,’ eye nàyɔ nɔviwò nyɔnu la be Ruhama si gɔmee nye ‘Nublanuikpɔkpɔ.’
“Mika mo na mia dada,
Ne egbe gale edzi la,
Nyemakpɔ nublanui na viawo o,
Wo dada wɔ ahasi kple ŋutsu bubuwo,
Ke nye la, matɔ kpɔ aƒo xlãe kple ŋutiwo;
eye ne eti eƒe lɔlɔ̃tɔwo yome la matu wo o.
Menyae be nyee naa bli,
“Ke azɔ la, maxɔ wain kple bli siwo menanɛ la le esi,
Azɔ maɖe amamae le dutoƒo be eƒe lɔlɔ̃tɔwo nakpɔ,
Matɔ te eƒe azãɖuɖuwo katã;
Magblẽ eƒe waingblewo kple gbotiwo,
Mahe to nɛ ɖe ɣeyiɣi siwo wòdo dzudzɔ ʋeʋĩ
“Eya ta mable enu akplɔe ayi ɖe gbedzi,
Afi ma magbugbɔ eƒe waingble la nɛ,
Yehowa be,
Maɖe Baalwo ƒe ŋkɔwo ɖa le ŋuwò,
Le ɣe ma ɣi me la,
Mabla wò ɖe ɖokuinye ŋu tegbee;
Mabla wò le anukwareɖiɖi me ɖe ɖokuinye ŋu,
Yehowa be:
anyigba hã aɖo to bli,
Maɖo nye dukɔ Israel te na ɖokuinye
